verses.verse: And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which have brought <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>.
Thou shalt have no other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%> before me <S%H6440><s%>.

Thou shalt not make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee any graven image <S%H6459><s%>, or any likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any thing that <S%H834><s%> is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>, or that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, or that is in the water <S%H4325><s%> under the earth <S%H776><s%>:

Thou shalt not bow down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> thyself to them, nor serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8714><s%> them: for I the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, visiting <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%> unto the third <S%H8029><s%> and fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me;
And shewing <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto thousands <S%H505><s%> of them that love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>.

Thou shalt not take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>; for the YY <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8762><s%> that taketh <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, to keep it holy <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou labour <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all thy work <S%H4399><s%>:

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: in it thou shalt not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%>, thou, nor thy son <S%H1121><s%>, nor thy daughter <S%H1323><s%>, thy manservant <S%H5650><s%>, nor thy maidservant <S%H519><s%>, nor thy cattle <S%H929><s%>, nor thy stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within thy gates <S%H8179><s%>:

For in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%>, the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and all that in them is, and rested <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>: wherefore the YY <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and hallowed <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it.

Honour <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> and thy mother <S%H517><s%>: that thy days <S%H3117><s%> may be long <S%H748><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon the land <S%H127><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee.
Thou shalt not kill <S%H7523><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Thou shalt not commit adultery <S%H5003><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Thou shalt not steal <S%H1589><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Thou shalt not bear <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against thy neighbour <S%H7453><s%>.

Thou shalt not covet <S%H2530><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, thou shalt not covet <S%H2530><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>, nor his manservant <S%H5650><s%>, nor his maidservant <S%H519><s%>, nor his ox <S%H7794><s%>, nor his ass <S%H2543><s%>, nor any thing that is thy neighbour's <S%H7453><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the thunderings <S%H6963><s%>, and the lightnings <S%H3940><s%>, and the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the shofar <S%H7782><s%>, and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> smoking <S%H6226><s%>: and when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, they removed <S%H5128><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thou with us, and we will hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: but let not 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with us, lest we die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not: for 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to <S%H5668><s%> prove <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8763><s%> you, and that his fear <S%H3374><s%> may be before your faces <S%H6440><s%>, that ye sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>, and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%> where 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> was.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Thus thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Ye have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I have talked <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with you from heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

Ye shall not make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with me 'elohim <S%H430><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, neither shall ye make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto you 'elohim <S%H430><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>.

An altar <S%H4196><s%> of earth <S%H127><s%> thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, and shalt sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thereon thy burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and thy peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, thy sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and thine oxen <S%H1241><s%>: in all places <S%H4725><s%> where I record <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> I will come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee, and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee.

And if thou wilt make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me an altar <S%H4196><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, thou shalt not build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it of hewn stone <S%H1496><s%>: for if thou lift up <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy tool <S%H2719><s%> upon it, thou hast polluted <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it.
Neither shalt thou go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by steps <S%H4609><s%> unto mine altar <S%H4196><s%>, that thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%> be not discovered <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8735><s%> thereon.
